text: Tom Barber may refer to: *Tom Barber (artist), cover artist for Weird Tales *Tom Barber (cricketer) (born 1995), English cricketer *Tom Barber (golfer) (1894–1936),English professional golfer *Tom Barber (Big Brother) (born 1996), English Big Brother contestant *Tom Barber (architect/designer) (1946-2018), Australian Architect/Designer/Mathematician/Activist ==See also== * Thomas Barber (disambiguation)
title: Tom Barber
